detaileddescription.para: All values from -128 to 127 allowed, only some defined
The allowed values for seeking speed are the range -64 to -4 (endpoints included), the value 0, and the range 4 to 64 (endpoints included).
A bitmap, in the same order as the playing orders above. Note that playing order 1 corresponds to bit 0, and so on.
Media control point supported opcodes length
Media control point supported opcodes values
Media control point notification result codes

memberdef.name: SEARCH_LEN_MIN
memberdef.initializer: 2 /* At least one search control item (SCI), * consisting of the length octet and the type * octet. (The parameter field may be empty.) */

memberdef.name: SEARCH_SCI_LEN_MIN
memberdef.initializer: 1 /* An SCI length can be as little as one byte, * for an SCI that has only the type field. * (The SCI len is the length of type + param.) */

memberdef.name: SEARCH_LEN_MAX
memberdef.initializer: 64 /* Max total length of search, defined by spec */

memberdef.name: SEARCH_PARAM_MAX
memberdef.initializer: 62 /* A search may have a single search control item * consisting of length, type and parameter */
